Create a lampshade with a custom design that incorporates your personal brand or company logo. This can be a great way to showcase your unique identity and make your workspace stand out.
Use a lampshade to add a pop of color to your office. Choose a shade that complements your existing color scheme and adds a touch of personality to your workspace.
Make a lampshade with a plant or herb holder. This can be a great way to bring some greenery into your office and create a relaxing atmosphere.

Create a lampshade with a charging dock for your phone or other electronic devices. This can be a great way to keep your devices charged and organized while also adding a functional element to your workspace.

Make a lampshade with a built-in speaker system. This can be a great way to listen to music or other audio while you work, and can also be a great way to create a more relaxing atmosphere in your office.
